description.zh-cn: 中国有机光电子专家，中国科学院院士。曾任南京工业大学校长、西北工业大学常务副校长。
description.en: A Chinese expert in organic optoelectronics and an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. He formerly served as the President of Nanjing Tech University and the Executive Vice President of Northwestern Polytechnical University.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名大学，黄维在此获得学士和博士学位。
description.en: A renowned university in China where Huang Wei obtained his bachelor's and doctoral degrees.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家科学技术方面最高学术机构和全国自然科学与高新技术综合研究发展中心。
description.en: The highest academic institution in science and technology of the People's Republic of China, and the national comprehensive research and development center for natural sciences and high technology.

description.zh-cn: 黄维于1963年5月出生于河北唐山。
description.en: Huang Wei was born in Tangshan, Hebei in May 1963.

description.zh-cn: 黄维于1983年在北京大学获学士学位，1992年在北京大学获博士学位。
description.en: Huang Wei received his bachelor's degree from Peking University in 1983 and his doctoral degree from Peking University in 1992.

relationships.target: 中国科学院信息技术科学部

description.zh-cn: 黄维于2011年当选为中国科学院院士。
description.en: Huang Wei was elected as an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2011.

relationships.source: 中国科学院信息技术科学部

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院信息技术科学部是中国科学院的下属学部之一。
description.en: The Division of Information Technical Sciences is one of the academic divisions of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 黄维于2012年7月至2017年4月期间担任南京工业大学校长。
description.en: Huang Wei served as the President of Nanjing Tech University from July 2012 to April 2017.

description.zh-cn: 黄维于2017年4月至2020年12月期间任西北工业大学常务副校长。
description.en: Huang Wei served as the Executive Vice President of Northwestern Polytechnical University from April 2017 to December 2020.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，黄维是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to category information, Huang Wei is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，黄维曾任南京邮电大学教授和副校长。
description.en: According to category information, Huang Wei has served as a professor and vice president of Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，黄维是江苏省科学技术协会副主席。
description.en: According to category information, Huang Wei is the Vice Chairman of the Jiangsu Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，黄维是中国化工学会会士。
description.en: According to category information, Huang Wei is a fellow of the Chemical Industry and Engineering Society of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，黄维是中国光学学会会士。
description.en: According to category information, Huang Wei is a fellow of the Chinese Optical Society.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，黄维是中国电子学会副理事长。
description.en: According to category information, Huang Wei is the Vice President of the Chinese Institute of Electronics.

relationships.target: 国务院学位委员会第七届学科评议组

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，黄维是国务院学位委员会第七届学科评议组成员。
description.en: According to category information, Huang Wei is a member of the 7th Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council's Subject Appraisal Group.

relationships.target: 中国电子学会第十届理事会

description.zh-cn: 根据导航模板，黄维是中国电子学会第十届理事会成员。
description.en: According to the navigation template, Huang Wei is a member of the 10th Council of the Chinese Institute of Electronics.

relationships.source: 中国电子学会第十届理事会

description.zh-cn: 中国电子学会第十届理事会是中国电子学会的一个组织机构。
description.en: The 10th Council is an organizational body of the Chinese Institute of Electronics.

relationships.target: 中国科学技术协会第九届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据导航模板，黄维是中国科学技术协会第九届全国委员会成员。
description.en: According to the navigation template, Huang Wei is a member of the 9th National Committee of the China Association for Science and Technology.

relationships.source: 中国科学技术协会第九届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术协会第九届全国委员会是中国科学技术协会的一个组织机构。
description.en: The 9th National Committee is an organizational body of the China Association for Science and Technology.
